author: Fextralife
description:
Star Wars Fate of the Old Republic Announcement: Everything You Need to Know
In this Fextralife video, we're going to be talking about Fate of the Old Republic. This is another game that was announced at the Game Awards just a few hours ago, and this is a big one in my opinion that this and Divinity are the two standouts for me at the game show, and these are the two games that I want to make videos about.

Timestamp:
0:00 Star Wars Fate of the Old Republic Announcement Trailer
1:24 Intro
1:52 Old Republic Era
2:47 Casey Hudson Game Director
3:16 Arcanaut Studios
3:48 What was shown in the trailer
4:11 Possible Gameplay
5:10 Lucasfilm Games Collaboration

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!

author: Fextralife
description:
Divinity Announcement: Everything You Need to Know About Larian Studios New Game
In this video, I'm going to be talking a little bit about Divinity, which is the new Larian Studios game that was announced at the Game Awards just a couple hours ago. If you followed the channel, you'll know that Divinity Original Sin 2 was the big break that I got on Fextralife's YouTube channel when we started doing builds and covering Divinity Original Sin 2. So a lot of Fextralife's roots are lodged in Divinity itself.

Timestamp:
0:00 Divinity Announcement Trailer
3:22 covering Divinity Original Sin 2
4:12 Announcement Rumors
4:52 Visual Fidelity
5:24 Third Divinity Game
5:55 Gameplay Type
6:18 BG3
7:23 Excited for Divinity
8:50 Final Thoughts

author: Fextralife
description:
Solasta 2 The Next Big RPG - Release Date & Cast Reveal. 
In this Fextralife video, we're going to be talking a little bit about Solasta 2. If you didn't know, the game just announced that it's going to go into early access on March 12th of next year. So that's just a few months away now. There has been a demo out for some time that's about 2 hours long that you can check out if you want to see how the gameplays for yourself and you don't want to wait for the early access. There is that currently that you can play.

Timestamp:
0:00 Solasta 2 Early Access
1:23 Solasta Crown of the Magister
3:15 Unreal 5 Engine
4:47 Voice Cast
7:10 The Future of Solasta 2
